info.description: Library management system with clean architecture
info.title: Library Service API

post.description: Login with email and password to receive JWT tokens

get.description: Get the authenticated member's information from JWT token

post.description: Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access token
Create a new member account with email and password

get.description: Retrieves a list of all authors in the system
Retrieves a list of all members in the system
Retrieves detailed profile information for a specific member
Displays the payment page for completing a payment

post.description: Initiate a payment and get payment gateway details

get.description: Get all payments for a specific member

post.description: Make a payment using a saved card

get.description: Get the current status of a payment

post.description: Cancel a pending or processing payment

get.description: Retrieves all receipts for the authenticated member

post.description: Generates a receipt for a completed payment

get.description: Retrieves a receipt by its ID
Get all reservations for the authenticated member

post.description: Reserve a book for the authenticated member

get.description: Get details of a specific reservation

delete.description: Cancel a reservation (only the owner can cancel)

get.description: Get all saved cards for the authenticated member

post.description: Save a payment card for future use
Set a saved card as the default payment method

refund_amount.description: Optional: if nil, full refund; if specified, partial refund

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
